long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It is a niche tool that is used to generate different types of QR Codes. Depending on your purpose, you can use our generator to create QR Codes to open a website, view a PDF file, listen to music, watch Youtube videos, store image files, connect to a WiFi network, and much more
